javadoc:
This plugin event class provides program location information for
 plugins that send information to two or more tools containing associated addresses.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: src
params.comment: the name of the plugin that generated this event.

params.name: loc
params.comment: the ProgramLocation object that contains the new location.

params.name: programName
params.comment: the name of the program for which the loc object refers.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: src
params.comment: the name of the plugin that generated this event.

params.name: loc
params.comment: the ProgramLocation object that contains the new location.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program for which the loc object refers.

methods.javadoc: Returns the ProgramLocation stored in this event.
methods.name: getLocation
methods.comment: Returns the ProgramLocation stored in this event.

methods.javadoc: Returns the Program object that the location refers to.
methods.name: getProgramName
methods.comment: Returns the Program object that the location refers to.

name: DualProgramLocationPluginEvent
comment:
This plugin event class provides program location information for
 plugins that send information to two or more tools containing associated addresses.
